changeSet.author: system
changeSet.comment: Activate KPI C.2 module and set it to automatic analysis
changeSet.sql: UPDATE ${database.defaultSchemaName}.MODULE SET TE_STATUS = 'ATTIVO', TE_ANALYSIS_TYPE = 'AUTOMATICA', FL_ALLOW_MANUAL_OUTCOME = false, TE_LAST_MODIFIED_BY = 'system', DT_LAST_MODIFIED_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE TE_CODE = 'C.2';
changeSet.rollback: UPDATE ${database.defaultSchemaName}.MODULE SET TE_STATUS = 'NON_ATTIVO', TE_ANALYSIS_TYPE = 'MANUALE', FL_ALLOW_MANUAL_OUTCOME = true, TE_LAST_MODIFIED_BY = 'system', DT_LAST_MODIFIED_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE TE_CODE = 'C.2';
